extendedIngredients.name: lemon pepper
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 tablespoon seasoning salt or lemon pepper

extendedIngredients.name: spaghetti
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 lb spaghetti, broken in 2-3 inch pieces

recipes.title: Chicken Spaghetti

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Chicken. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. You could try Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay. Reviewers quite like it with a 5 out of 5 star rating and a price of about 35 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Mercer Estates Zephyr Ridge Vineyard Reserve Chardonnay
productMatches.description: Aromas of apricot, guava and pineapple juice mingle with hints of sweet vanilla and warm toasty notes.

recipes.instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Boil noodles in broth and water according to package directions. Drain noodles while reserving 1 cup of cooking liquid. In a stockpot, place cooked noodles and remaining ingredients (reserve 1/2 cup of cheese). I add one can of soup and stir in a little of the reserved liquid. If it is dry, add the second can of mushroom soup. Stir until combined and adjust seasonings to taste. Cover with remaining 1/2 cup of cheddar cheese. If you mixed all ingredients in a cast iron stockpot that is ovenproof, you can just put it directly in the oven. Cook for 30-40 minutes or until bubbly.

steps.step: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Boil noodles in broth and water according to package directions.

Drain noodles while reserving 1 cup of cooking liquid. In a stockpot, place cooked noodles and remaining ingredients (reserve 1/2 cup of cheese). I add one can of soup and stir in a little of the reserved liquid. If it is dry, add the second can of mushroom soup. Stir until combined and adjust seasonings to taste. Cover with remaining 1/2 cup of cheddar cheese. If you mixed all ingredients in a cast iron stockpot that is ovenproof, you can just put it directly in the oven. Cook for 30-40 minutes or until bubbly.
